text: Rhode Island's 3rd congressional district is a United States congressional district that is no longer in use. It was active from 1913 until 1933. It used to cover Providence and most of its inner suburbs. It was eliminated after the 1930 census and split between the 1st and 2nd districts. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressional Biographical Directory of the United States 1774â€“present Category:Congressional districts of Rhode Island
title: Rhode Island's 3rd congressional district
